name: Easy Collect And Drop for WooCommerce
author: And Africa LCC

sections.description:
ECD, short for Easy Collect & Drop, is a delivery service provider that facilitates parcels’ pickup and drop-off.
ECD offers various delivery solutions including To-Door delivery and ECD Points Delivery. Our customers can choose to have their parcels delivered to their home address or the closest ECD Point to them where they can collect their parcel when they have time.
ECD Points include ECD Smart Lockers installed in various locations such as shopping centres and residential complexes and ECD Partner Stores such as printing stores, grocery stores, and more.
By adding ECD plugin to your WooCommerce store as a delivery option, your customers’ purchases can be delivered from your warehouse or collection point to their preferred destination (their home address or closest ECD Point to them).
ECD solutions were developed to improve the whole delivery process in terms of efficiency, flexibility, and cost-effectiveness. ECD plugin’s main goal is to enhance your customer’s shopping experience and their overall satisfaction as we offer them a flexible and large enough pick-up window thanks to ECD Points, they can pick up their purchases after a morning workout, during a break from work, or even in the late evening after work hours.
With ECD you can enjoy all the following benefits:
– Affordable rates and convenient delivery experience for all parties involved.
– A safe and secure delivery system with various options to accommodate the different requirements of customers.
– Better accessibility with ECD lockers being available 7 days a week and for longer hours.
– Cost-effectiveness by avoiding inconvenient redeliveries thanks to ECD Points.
– No fixed or hidden fees.
– Ensured communication by email and SMS notifications.
– Efficient and friendly customer support.

Launching ECD plugin:
Please install the ECD plugin and contact us with your shop details so that we can set up an ECD Shop account for you and send you your account credentials and all the needed API information.
You can contact us at: info@easycollectanddrop.com

Pricing Policy:
There are no fixed fees, you only pay fees per handled parcel. We charge based on the parcel’s size, chosen delivery option, and distance.
Please read our Terms & Conditions of service for more information

ECD official website: www.easycollectanddrop.com/
ECD privacy policy: https://www.easycollectanddrop.com/privacy-policy/
ECD terms and conditions of service: https://www.easycollectanddrop.com/terms-conditions-of-service/

short_description: Connect your WooCommerce site to ECD Courier with the ECD for WooCommerce Plugin and offer the best delivery option to your customers.
